thi-ap21:25.2: balimajjhāsayo → khalitajjhāsayo (bj); baliṃ paccāharaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); mālapaccāhataṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap21:30.3: Na ca dāni puno atthi → taṃ vandāmi puna natthi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap21:33.3: Migaṃ uṇṇā yathā evaṃ → cittapuṇṇāyatāneva (sya1ed, sya2ed); migaṃ puṇṇāyateneva (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap21:45.4: īdisaṃ cintayiṃ → iti saṃcintayiṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); iti sañcintayiṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
